Package index

All functions

atl_add_tidaldata()
Add tidal data to tracking data.
atl_check_data()
Check data has required columns.
atl_filter_bounds()
Filter positions by an area.
atl_filter_covariates()
Filter data by position covariates.
atl_full_tag_id()
Create full tag name
atl_get_data()
Get data from a SQLite-database.
atl_get_data_csv()
Get data from a local csv file.
atl_get_spatial_bounds()
Get spatial bounds for dataframe X,Y coordinates.
atl_get_speed()
Calculate instantaenous speed.
atl_median_smooth()
Apply a median smooth to coordinates.
atl_patch_dist()
Get the distance between patches.
atl_patch_summary()
Get residence patch data.
atl_plot_add_track()
Add tracks to plot from list.
atl_plot_rpatches()
Add residence patches to a plot.
atl_plot_tag()
Plot track for one individual on a simple background.
atl_plot_tag_osm()
Plot track for one individual on a OpenStreetMap satellite map.
atl_res_patch_speed()
Construct residence patches from position data.
atl_simple_dist()
Calculate distances between successive localizations.
atl_t_col()
Make a colour transparant.
atl_thin_data()
Thin tracking data by resampling or aggregation.
atl_turning_angle()
Get the turning angle between points.
atl_within_polygon()
Detect position intersections with a polygon.
atlas_make_boundingbox_for_osm()
Create bounding box in LatLong for downloading a map from OpenStreetMap.
atlas_make_spatialdataframe()
Make X,Y data spatial.

mudflats
Intertidal Dutch Wadden Sea
plot_map_osm()
Plot a map downloaded with OpenStreetMap.
